paragraphs.content: Psalm 88
paragraphs.contentHtml: Psalm 88

paragraphs.content: A Song or Psalm for the sons of Korah, to the chief Musician upon Mahalath Leannoth, Maschil of Heman the Ezrahite.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A Song or Psalm for the sons of Korah, to the chief Musician upon Mahalath Leannoth, Maschil of Heman the Ezrahite.

paragraphs.content: O LORD God of my salvation, I have cried day and night before thee:
paragraphs.contentHtml: O Lord God of my salvation, I have cried day and night before thee:

paragraphs.content: Let my prayer come before thee: incline thine ear unto my cry;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let my prayer come before thee: incline thine ear unto my cry;

paragraphs.content: For my soul is full of troubles: and my life draweth nigh unto the grave.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For my soul is full of troubles: and my life draweth nigh unto the grave.

paragraphs.content: I am counted with them that go down into the pit: I am as a man that hath no strength:
paragraphs.contentHtml: I am counted with them that go down into the pit: I am as a man that hath no strength:

paragraphs.content: Free among the dead, like the slain that lie in the grave, whom thou rememberest no more: and they are cut off from thy hand.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Free among the dead, like the slain that lie in the grave, whom thou rememberest no more: and they are cut off from thy hand.

paragraphs.content: Thou hast laid me in the lowest pit, in darkness, in the deeps.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou hast laid me in the lowest pit, in darkness, in the deeps.

paragraphs.content: Thy wrath lieth hard upon me, and thou hast afflicted me with all thy waves. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy wrath lieth hard upon me, and thou hast afflicted me with all thy waves. Selah.

paragraphs.content: Thou hast put away mine acquaintance far from me; thou hast made me an abomination unto them: I am shut up, and I cannot come forth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou hast put away mine acquaintance far from me; thou hast made me an abomination unto them: I am shut up, and I cannot come forth.

paragraphs.content: Mine eye mourneth by reason of affliction: LORD, I have called daily upon thee, I have stretched out my hands unto thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Mine eye mourneth by reason of affliction: Lord, I have called daily upon thee, I have stretched out my hands unto thee.

paragraphs.content: Wilt thou shew wonders to the dead? shall the dead arise and praise thee? Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wilt thou shew wonders to the dead? shall the dead arise and praise thee? Selah.

paragraphs.content: Shall thy lovingkindness be declared in the grave? or thy faithfulness in destruction?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Shall thy lovingkindness be declared in the grave? or thy faithfulness in destruction?

paragraphs.content: Shall thy wonders be known in the dark? and thy righteousness in the land of forgetfulness?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Shall thy wonders be known in the dark? and thy righteousness in the land of forgetfulness?

paragraphs.content: But unto thee have I cried, O LORD; and in the morning shall my prayer prevent thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But unto thee have I cried, O Lord; and in the morning shall my prayer prevent thee.

paragraphs.content: LORD, why castest thou off my soul? why hidest thou thy face from me?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Lord, why castest thou off my soul? why hidest thou thy face from me?

paragraphs.content: I am afflicted and ready to die from my youth up: while I suffer thy terrors I am distracted.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I am afflicted and ready to die from my youth up: while I suffer thy terrors I am distracted.

paragraphs.content: Thy fierce wrath goeth over me; thy terrors have cut me off.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thy fierce wrath goeth over me; thy terrors have cut me off.

paragraphs.content: They came round about me daily like water; they compassed me about together.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They came round about me daily like water; they compassed me about together.

paragraphs.content: Lover and friend hast thou put far from me, and mine acquaintance into darkness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Lover and friend hast thou put far from me, and mine acquaintance into darkness.
